Articles.Content:
Or a matter of time?

I was surfing by the net when i stuck on this picture...

Well... We already have got these mods like the amazing RoverDude's Modular Kolonization, Kerbtown and the most important KAS! So i think was a matter of time until we begin to build our own customised bases, outposts, lake houses by the kerbol system.

(Even in Multiplayer, maybe?)

A komunity building up Kerbin alltogether?

I have already made a "Water World" like offshore platform, and beautified it with KAS.

And you guys?

Edited July 17, 2014 by Nahim

This one is from a user named TW1

And this:

And this is the thread that did it come from. Its amazing!
